item.description:
Last year we got a bit delayed for this meeting. How about this time, we stop at IJD to eat then skip over to SFZ (North Central) . Short flights, food, and good friends. Not to mention, we can heckle Bob!

FAASTeam & The Boston FSDO presents:
Pilot Deviation Awareness and Prevention

This seminar will enhance your Pilot Deviation Awareness. Come join us for a review of Airspace rules including an in depth explanation and discussion on Temporary Flight Restrictions (TFRs). There will be a highly informative Question and Answer session with Air Traffic Controller, Bob Adelizzi so be sure to bring your questions!

Sat, Nov 20, 2010 - 9:00 am
Landmark Aviation Hangar
300 Jenckes Hill Road
Smithfield, RI 02917
Contact: STEPHEN W. GROTA
(781) 357-4935
stephen.grota@faa.gov
Select #: EA6135303
FPM STEPHEN W. GROTA

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Pilot Deviation Awareness and Prevention (and food)
